name: Howl At The Moon Grill & Bar

reviews.text: Good place to buy milk and bread.
Great service and very friendly
I miss A B
All depends on the day of the week , great place overall
overpriced , bad service
There wings are to die for been going to this place for years make it 24 years to be. The owners are very nice and pleasant and respectful even the workers .
Drinks are awesome.. friendly atmosphere juju I believe that's her name.. makes awesome mix drinks
Unless you're a drunk college kid wanting to get drunker

I had to get out of there in the middle of my meal
because there was a roach crawling through the cracks of the walls.

Mostly because I got food. Great prices, 3 beers And a quick side costs half of anywhere you'd run into in Manhattan and was not bad at all. Music doesn't drown out the sports games. Great place to go if you want to watch sports and have a couple beers without breaking the bank.
Kitchen was closed at 5 pm ??   Cheap drinks pretty strong
Late night food and great environment in the Arthur ave/Fordham uni area.

Recently went for the first time and i had a great time, the bartender there at the time was super nice, respectful and he hustled to attend to everyone there. Had a good crowd and everyone was nice. The food was also very good, I had the bbq wings, curly fries and mac and cheese balls and they were all very good. Would definitely show up again
College hang out but the drinks are good and the food is decent. Just wish they had more staff but they all do their best when they have to hustle.

Shout Out To Donna !
She was sooo good to my sisters and I.
Super attentive, the food was quick and the DRINKS were sooo good !

Howl at the Moon was a dazzling experience where I invited my ladyfriend to see what was so exciting with the campus students having a good time. She and I ordered two sets of BBQ wings, perfectly seasoned and displayed. The atmosphere is like a very chill lounge. You can relax in the bar with catchy contemporary music while looking at the outside world. And the waiter was exceptionally nice as she delivered the wings. I would go back on my free time.
One of the better college bars
The bartenders were very friendly and attentive! Food was great! Loved the Buffalo wings and Mac n cheese balls! The drinks are DEFINITELY worth their price and strong.
Always a decent place to watch a game. There are different patrons from university kids, folks from the area and local professionals. Somehow it meshes well.
Good food. Great drinks..Great service

Beer was warm .. we needed to ask for ice . Chicken Kabob was not cooked well pink inside as you cut through it. Very bad lettuce served over the kabobs. I understand your lettuce is bad but why serve it as a garnishment. Gratuity added‚Ä¶
Awwoooooo
Great service they will always remember your fav drink lol bartender gigi is the best
A nice place to have drink and watch sports and listen to some music.
Delicious
Awesome food,friendly staff.
Great bar in the Belmont Fordham area of the Bronx.... good bar food as well!

Wings and tacos are a must try.
Great atmosphere just make sure you're charged correctlyüëÄ‚Ä¶

Bouncer telling me its a private party while letting young folks in for 20bucks without even checking ID.  I moved to the neighborhood not long ago, not too many bars around and most of them have this obsession with young college studens, get a grib, i Just wanted to chill and have a drink watch game ,would not recommend

Great atmosphere and professional customer service with a smile but as for the food. The french fries are way too expensive ($7.99) and the wings wasn't delightful at all. The ( hot ) wings were not hot & the garlic parmesan wings were watery sauce.
Nice dive bar, margaritas were nice and strong.
When I tell you this place is over price!!! That‚Äôs enough to say don‚Äôt come here
My favorite bar! Great drinks, food and vibes. Love coming here so much.
Fun place, bouncers wear fake police stuff and charge $25 at the door for you to suffocate to death while waiting for a drink. Still would go 7 days out of the week. Lovely place.
My fav bar
I have been coming here for years and they‚Äôre super consistent & i love the staff! üñ§ my fav bartender knows my order / drink included !‚Ä¶
Good
Great experience! Downtown party vibe in the Bronx. Bartenders are quick and courteous with service üëçüèæ
Nice little place in little Italy where could watch sports
Fun spot for some early drinks before the college kids. Great vibe nice people. Owner was very sweet and talked with us for a bit.

This place is always good to me and friends when it comes on to hospitality. The drinks, food and servers are great and I enjoy their music most of the time. However this one particle time, me & my friends requested a song to the dj and as we waited more college people were coming in. We waited about 15 to 20 minutes before we went back to him to ask about the song. In return, his response was ‚ÄúI dont have a reason to not play your song, sorry.‚Äù and in disbelief and shock we returned to our night out. It was just a bummer that one song couldnt be played due to another group of people having a certain music taste. üëéüèæüëéüèæüëéüèæ The dj of the night was named andreas, cool  guy but his decision was kinda unfair. :/
Great place to veg with the games. They've got all the Sports packages.
Big down grade from pre-pandemic , very disappointed in the service overall.....
Love it , that's my spot

This place slowed down a bit for what it used to be given the pandemic. But, it is a great local spot in The Bronx where college students go and usually start their night. Service is always great and prices are good.
The service is horrible & whoever the red head is needs to get fired! Wasted my time and money. She‚Äôs incompetent and slow as hell!
This dive is chill. Good food & drink. Bartenders are courteous and fast. They recently changed cooks and the food quality took a dip, but that a personal taste preference. I frequent regularly.
Easy going place. Friendly staff.great nachos
The ideal college bar. Liz is the best!
NICE AND FRIENDLY ATMOSPHERE \ GOOD FOOD MUSIC

The food was delicious and the drinks were great! Our waitress was attentive and polite. It is located near Fordham University but it draws in college students and the locals. I will definitely be returning soon.
My friend brought me here and honestly the food was amazing and so where the drinks . Nice area and good atmosphere
First time at the bar, and had a good time. Helen, the bartender, was great, always checking up on me if I needed anything else. Love the wings and the drinks.
It's very clean, delicious food, Yohan the bartender makes amazing mojitos and margaritasüç∏üçπ.   Loved it‚Ä¶

This place is absolutely awesome the food is amazing taste great we ordered the skirt steak for $22 well worth the price, the ribs for $15 also well worth the price. My mom said the burger I order for her was to die for. All of the food‚Ä¶

Went there the day I moved into the neighborhood. Had a decent experience, and tipped very generously. Went back exactly one week later. The waiter remembered us and welcomed us back. We got seated, they brought out two waters and menus. That was the last time we talked to anyone there. Over twenty minutes of waiting, and no one came to even take drink orders, much less food. Two tables that arrived after us had their drinks already, and we had yet to place a drink order. One of them even had their appetizers. Finally we got up and left, and even then the wait staff paid no attention as we walked away. I will not be returning there ever again. Clearly my earlier tip was not money well spent.

First time here and the boneless wings are so good. The Asian bartender is very attentive and friendly. She put me onto the special for wings which made my night even better. Definitely recommend this place. A hidden gem.

The atmosphere is great, the bar tenders attentive. They don't seem to know much about beer. The fordam college crowd on a wednesday night was about 15 kids at one table, so seem happening, two at another and then two old dudes a the bar.‚Ä¶

I usually love this place. I have been going here since I was in college a few years ago. I visited the restaurant recently and the bartender refused to serve my friend alcohol telling him it was a fake ID. We are all 27 years old (not 21‚Ä¶

I've been here a couple of times making deliveries.The atmosphere seems lively enough and the staff are exquisite but the portions of food are small for a bar and grill.but this isn't a large place the food taste great and I will assume they make drinks well as I was working so I only had water. But that water was great.

I came here because I thought they had drinks like the one that was downtown. Big mistake. I had a mojito. It was okay and I didn't realize until I starting drinking the glass had colored stains on it. I should have sent the drink back. The‚Ä¶

The food is awesome. The drinks are awesome I love this place if I can go everyday of the week I definitely would. Nice chill place to just go with your friends. Couldn‚Äôt ask for a better place in all honesty.

I lived in Buffalo for 3 years and when I came back home I could not find wings that even came close until I tried the wings at Howl, just the fact that you can get hot medium or mild is great and the barbecue or honey barbecue were the best I ever had. Nice bar great food

I was here with some friends who had an issue with the bartenders messing up two of their tabs. Both friends were charged for drinks they didn‚Äôt ask for and weren‚Äôt served. The bartenders were very aggressive about not wanting to fix the‚Ä¶
Will always be my favorite place to get wings. Simply amazing. Back when I was younger I frequently went here for the college nights. Cheap drinks as well and great service.

If I could rate the bar at a zero I would. My friend and I are both US Army Veterans of Operation Enduring Freedom wars. He‚Äôs a West Point graduate and I was a Sergeant in the military. We were denied entrance to the bar because it was ‚Äúcollege night.‚Äù And this has not happened once or twice, but multiple times.
The food here is amazing. The drinks are affordable and the bartenders are very attentive. The entire staff is friendly. The asian girl and the girl with the braces are the best.

I had the new Salmon Burger with steak fries and cold slaw. I gaffled that burger down with tariaki sauce lettuce and tomato and onion. Come in for Happy hour 5 dollar drink specials. Friendly staff and great meet and greet cook. # Howl at the Moon

This is a great place. The food is excellent. My favorite is the prime rib eye steak..yummyüçñüçóüç¥üçªüçπüçæüåΩüç∑üç∏üç∑.The prices are very reasonable.Hospitality on point. I'd recommend For a Saturday or Sunday brunch. ‚õß‚õ¶‚õ•‚õ§‚õ§.‚Ä¶
Definitely coming back. My first time here and they had a new chef . Oh boy was his dessert was soooooo goood. The girls were so great too. See ya soon

We used to always hang out here and liked this place. Today we were victims of blatant racism. This place has a jukebox, so we paid for several latin songs and the waiting staff was offended by our choice of music, they acted angry throwing‚Ä¶
Food is great. Awesome beer selection, staff is really good and make you feel at home and attend to ya and make sure you smile. Great pour. Enjoy, mate :)

I attended this pub for the 2nd time and after spending at least $100 on beers/ food, I was told by security I had to leave because it was a Fordham only event...I told them I was a Fordham alumni but security told me it was only for current students. I asked if there was any fees I could pay in order to stay since the students entering the pub were paying $15 and the security guard told me in order to stay I had to pay a $55 fee....I did leave the bar in order to  avoid getting thrown out the bar, because there is no way I was paying $55 and I did give my few extra words of annoyance to security and they went to get the police...I just left to avoid another situation but I definitely left with anger because why would a business organize an event and tell customers to leave because it‚Äôs only for Fordham students shows a lack of organization/management and disrespect.
Love the bartenders. Food and drinks are awesome. Music is great. A must go to experience it for yourself. Grantee you will keep going. Friendly place. I love howl at the moon.üíòüíã‚Ä¶
Food was ok. Even though I didn't like that there was not a DJ, the environment felt cozy, friendly. The bartender was polite,  respectful, and did accommodated me nicely in general.

What is going on with this place, very racist service, they practically threw us out, We were cerebrating a birthday party tonight and one waitress told us to stop playing latin music in the jukebox and leave. We were almost the only people‚Ä¶
Food is delicious. Personal go to are the wings and the quesadilla with steak. Haven‚Äôt had any complaints. Never ate in, always ordered to go. Nothing beats the comfort of your own home.
The service was really good and attentive, the food was great and delicious, although the place is small everything including drinks were wonderful. I had a relaxing , enjoyable time.
Great food in a neighborhood lacking a lot of pubs with a decent menu. The beer selection is so/so but I definitely am a regular for the burgers and wings.
